inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: plans to deliver at Baystate Medical Center

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of STI during the three months prior to enrollment

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: no information about desire for further pregnancy within six months of giving birth

notes: The patient has cervical cancer, but it is stage 1B and she underwent a radical hysterectomy. She smokes 30 packs/year and drinks alcohol frequently.
